course_description: This course provides an in-depth study of pharmacodynamics, pharmacokinetics, pharmacotherapeutics, pharmacogenetics, and toxicology along with principles of drug actions, uptake, distribution, biotransformation, and elimination related to the practice of anesthesia.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3216, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 1:30-4:30p, Instructor: J. McLeod Jr., Status: Closed
